channel.title: How to safe files in a specific place?
channel.description:
When i try safe file elsewhere than by default (TOR/download) i got error that i don't have permission to do that.
I would like to be able to save files where I like. How to do it? it is important for me. Please help me.

item.title: How to safe files in a specific place?
item.dc:creator: athread4
item.description:
Patrick:

You’d need to replace the path.

Replace the path? But where is path? rwl or what? My folder for exemple is called “lol”.
How to set it correct?

Read full topic
item.source: How to safe files in a specific place?

item.title: How to safe files in a specific place?
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
athread4 via Whonix Forum:

/media/sf_shared/ r,
/media/sf_shared/** rwl,

You’d need to replace the path.

Read full topic
item.source: How to safe files in a specific place?

item.title: How to safe files in a specific place?
item.dc:creator: athread4
item.description:
Still i can’t safe file in shared folder. I opened the terminal and pasted all the commands one by one:
1:
/etc/apparmor.d/local/home.tor-browser.firefox
2:
sudoedit /etc/apparmor.d/local/home.tor-browser.firefox
3:
I pasted and saved the below value in a text file:
/media/sf_shared/ r,
/media/sf_shared/** rwl,
4:
sudo aa-enforce /etc/apparmor.d/home.tor-browser.firefox

And still i can’t safe any files… please help me in more detail

Read full topic
item.source: How to safe files in a specific place?
